Creation Story.quote: "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth." (Genesis 1:1)

Divine Word.quote: "And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light." (Genesis 1:3)

Creative Power.quote: "By the word of the Lord the heavens were made." (Psalm 33:6)

Creation Process.quote: "First there was the void, then desire arose, which was the primal seed of mind." (Rig Veda 10.129)

Creation Purpose.quote: "I have created the jinn and humankind only to worship Me." (Quran 51:56)

Creative Force.quote: "Brahman is that from which the origin, sustenance, and dissolution of this universe arise." (Vedanta Sutra 1.1.2)

Creation Stages.quote: "For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that is in them." (Exodus 20:11)

Creation Order.quote: "The Tao gave birth to One, One gave birth to Two, Two gave birth to Three, Three gave birth to all things." (Tao Te Ching 42)

Creative Act.quote: "When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, 'Be,' and it is." (Quran 2:117)

Creation Beauty.quote: "He has made everything beautiful in its time." (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Creation Wisdom.quote: "The Lord by wisdom founded the earth; by understanding he established the heavens." (Proverbs 3:19)

Creation Nature.quote: "Nature is the art of God." (Dante Alighieri)

Creation Harmony.quote: "The whole universe exists in perfect harmony according to natural law." (Bhagavad Gita 3:14)

Creation Energy.quote: "All creation springs from the two basic forces of Yin and Yang." (I Ching)

Creation Time.quote: "With the Lord one day is as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day." (2 Peter 3:8)

Creation Cycles.quote: "The universe is created, maintained, and dissolved in endless cycles." (Bhagavata Purana 12.4)

Creation Purpose.quote: "For by him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible." (Colossians 1:16)

Creation Design.quote: "How many are your works, Lord! In wisdom you made them all." (Psalm 104:24)

Creation Elements.quote: "From water We made every living thing." (Quran 21:30)

Creation Life.quote: "Then the Lord God formed man from the dust of the ground and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life." (Genesis 2:7)

Creation Consciousness.quote: "The Universe is not only governed by consciousness but is consciousness." (Sri Aurobindo)

Creation Evolution.quote: "The whole creation has been groaning as in the pains of childbirth right up to the present time." (Romans 8:22)

Creation Unity.quote: "All things are unified in the One." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Creation Care.quote: "The Lord God took the man and put him in the Garden of Eden to work it and take care of it." (Genesis 2:15)
